text:
Valuable tool! "The #COVID19 #Vaccine Communication Handbook" https://t.co/EXw33synlh

For example:  "The risk of #anaphylaxis from the COVID-19 vaccine (1 in 200,000) is therefore 10,000 times smaller than our background risk."

To battle the #Infodemic we must #ScienceUpFirst! https://t.co/2ub20vBvDz
